name: SIZE CHART
description: IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT YOU MEASURE THE LARGEST PART OF YOUR MIDSECTION SO YOU CAN ORDER THE CORRECT SIZE CORSET. REMEMBER, THERE ARE NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES SO MAKE SURE YOU SELECT THE PROPER SIZE. IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS REGARDING THE SIZE CHART PLEASE CONTACT ME AT 510-457-8685 OR REALBENTLEYCOOP@GMAIL.COM. YOU DO NOT HAVE TO SELECT THE CHART FOR YOUR CART. THIS IS SOLELY FOR YOUR VIEWING.

name: Thermo Belly Band
description:
The thermo belly band is the perfect shaper for working out, the gym, walking or running. It is a very convenient weight loss product. It slims and shapes your waist.
This thermo band has 5 adjustable zipper closures and fits waist sizes 26" to 52". This band creates sauna like action and causes you to shed excess water weight while you exercise.
-The Thermo Belly Band provides excellent back support.
-Made of neoprene.
-For men and women
Can be used along with Defining Gel for maximum results

name: Latex Steel Bone Waist Cincher
description:
This latex waist cincher accelerates weight loss through waist compression. It instantly lifts, shapes, and slims  the body and flattens your stomach waist and hips. For maximum results, it is recommended that this cincher be worn for at least 6-8 hours a day. Loose 1-4 inches within 30 days. 
ALL SALES ARE FINAL. NO EXCHANGES OR REFUNDS
